text: Bruce Kendall Corbitt (December 22, 1962 – January 25, 2019) was an American heavy metal singer. He was best known for alternately fronting the bands Rigor Mortis and Warbeast. His aggressive vocals were first heard on Rigor Mortis’ self-titled debut. Corbitt was diagnosed with stage III esophageal cancer in May 2017. He died on January 25, 2019 at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:American heavy metal singers Category:Singers from Dallas
title: Bruce Corbitt
